snippet: The work is a translation of the sixth book of Virgil’s Aeneid, in which the hero Aeneas travels to the underworld to find his dead father.
abstract: The work is a translation of the sixth book of Virgil’s Aeneid, in which the hero Aeneas travels to the underworld to find his dead father.

headline.main: New Seamus Heaney Translation to be Published Next Year
headline.print_headline: A Final Translation By Seamus Heaney
